process-services.title: Pricing and Initial Consultation
process-services.description: We start with an initial consultation to understand your project requirements, goals, and budget. Following that, we provide a comprehensive proposal detailing the scope of work, pricing, and timeline.

process-services.title: Design for Shopify Store
process-services.description: Our team is committed to crafting visually appealing, user-friendly designs that not only capture attention but also enhance the overall user experience and boost conversions.

process-services.title: Theme Development
process-services.description: Our team begins the development of your custom Shopify store by focusing on creating a design that is both compatible and visually appealing. We prioritise building a highly functional eCommerce platform that aligns seamlessly with your brand and business objectives.

process-services.title: Testing
process-services.description: Our testers conduct thorough testing to guarantee that your Shopify store operates flawlessly. We conduct functionality tests, usability assessments, and security checks, all rooted in our commitment to Quality Assurance.

process-services.title: Client Review and Possible Amendments
process-services.description: We present the Shopify store for your review and feedback, giving you the chance to request design and functionality modifications. Each task undergoes final testing before completion.

process-services.title: Deployment
process-services.description: Following your review and any optional amendments, we guarantee a seamless deployment, transitioning your Shopify store from the development phase to full production.

process-services.title: Your Project Acceptance
process-services.description: After we deliver the final updates, you have 30 days to share your feedback. You can officially accept the project once you are fully satisfied with the final deliverable.

process-services.title: Project development and maintenance
process-services.description: We provide ongoing maintenance and development services for your Shopify store after its successful launch. You can request new features, updates, or modifications to adapt to your evolving business needs.
